attributes.additional_details:
As it is not the first time a crime happens in Leicester, Aylestone meadows, we want the area to be operated by CCTV. Alot of people are walking their dogs, riding horses, jogging, going to work, cycling through the Aylestone meadows - it is no longer a safe public place as of the recent sexual assault of a cyclist. (http://www.leicestermercury.co.uk/Police-alert-robbery-sex-attack-Aylestone-Meadows/story-22870672-detail/story.html)

We want this whole area completely covered by cameras, every single bit of it - NO MORE CRIMES IN AYLESTONE MEADOWS!
